response.hook: Dive into the world of quadratic equations with this robust solver that not only calculates roots and vertices but also visualizes the equation's graph!

key_lines.text: This is a program that calculate the roots, vertices and plot the graphic of a quadratic equation.
return round(((-b + delta ** (1 / 2)) / (2 * a)), 3), round(((-b - delta ** (1 / 2)) / (2 * a)), 3)

summary: This program calculates the roots and vertices of a quadratic equation.
It determines if the equation is ascending or descending.
The graphical representation of the equation is plotted using matplotlib.
